line.comment: * PIRACY: BLACK MARKET WARES LIBRARY -by- MISTER BEAR v1.00 Jan-2011
* DESCRIPTION: Functions for using and querying new wares added by Piracy collection
* ADD BLACK MARKET WARES TO SHIP : Add black market wares to a ship (if appropriate) and mark it as examined
* GET BLACK MARKET WARE PROPERTY : Get various properties of a black market ware
* ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Property 1:Average Price 2:Minimum Price 3:Maximum Price 4:Maximum stock for stations
* Worth a lot but very rare
* Increase the amount a station will buy
* Not so valueable individually but found in bulk (TODO: Simply raise value?)
* Increase the amount a station will buy
* Could be used by enslave passengers
* Space weed, Space Fuel, Space flies
* [PRICES] Use the standard functions for standard wares
* [PRICES] Alter the base price by 'i' to create min and max, if required

sval.val: PIRACY: BLACK MARKET WARES LIBRARY -by- MISTER BEAR v1.00 Jan-2011
DESCRIPTION: Functions for using and querying new wares added by Piracy collection
ADD BLACK MARKET WARES TO SHIP : Add black market wares to a ship (if appropriate) and mark it as examined
GET BLACK MARKET WARE PROPERTY : Get various properties of a black market ware
ARGUMENT 2 : [int] Property 1:Average Price 2:Minimum Price 3:Maximum Price 4:Maximum stock for stations
Worth a lot but very rare
Increase the amount a station will buy
Not so valueable individually but found in bulk (TODO: Simply raise value?)
Increase the amount a station will buy
Could be used by enslave passengers
Space weed, Space Fuel, Space flies
[PRICES] Use the standard functions for standard wares
[PRICES] Alter the base price by 'i' to create min and max, if required
